attributes.action: Revert registering a death back to the coronavirus act 2020 (Priti Patel Mar 20)
attributes.additional_details:
Benefitting bereaved families to register a death remotely without a physical appointment.
Option for registrars to work from home should the need arise.
More efficient for the registrars and families to issue documents.
Reduces the impact on the environment. (Less Car Journeys)
attributes.background: We would like to streamline the process of registering a death utilising a more efficient, cost effective, modern approach as was implemented during the coronavirus pandemic.
